H0.text: 10 km/h was the average speed for the whole trip in which the family rode a car for 2 hours, stopped for 3 hours, rode another 5 hours, and covered a total distance of 400 kilometers in one day.

H1.text: 20 km/h is the average speed for the family’s whole trip of 400 kilometers, which they covered by riding 2 hours, stopping 3 hours, and riding another 5 hours.

H2.text: 40 km/h is the average speed of the family’s entire trip, during which they rode for 2 hours, stopped for 3 hours, rode another 5 hours, and covered a total distance of 400 kilometers in one day.

H3.text: 50 km/h is the average speed for the whole trip, during which the family drove for 2 hours, stopped for 3 hours, then drove another 5 hours, covering a total distance of 400 kilometers.
